headline: Is There a Long Term Opportunity in Akamai Technologies After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: Wondering whether Akamai Technologies is quietly turning into a value opportunity? You are not alone. Many investors are revisiting this long standing edge computing and security player. Despite a choppy ride, with the stock down 9.3% year to date and 11.1% over the last year, Akamai has shown it can still grind out gains over longer periods, with a modest 2.9% return over 3 years. Recently, investors have been focused on Akamai's push deeper into edge computing and cloud security, including...
